modName: Brokefoot UNP Mashup Compilation - Clothing Version
summary: Converts Brokefoot\\\\\\\'s original mod into a clothing version (0 armor, not classified as light armor anymore)
descriptionHtml:
I made this mod for my own personal use, but figured other people would be interested.

What it does:
Changes all the clothing sets (Leah, Dandelion, Vicky, Khantu, Temptress) into ArmorClothing category of apparel, and sets their armor level to 0.

Why:
I use SkyRe, and in the alteration school there is a perk that makes armor type spells (oakflesh, ironflesh, etc) more powerful if wearing 0 armor.

Requires the original brokefoot mashup:
http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/20415

Download and install this mod over it, overwriting it (it\\\\\\\'s just the .esp)

Modified with permission from Brokefoot.

All categories in crafting have been maintained. The only changes that were made were:
1. Removed ArmorLight from all pieces, added ArmorClothing and their respecting types for footwear/handwear
2. Set Armor Class to \\\\\\\"none\\\\\\\" instead of \\\\\\\"light\\\\\\\"
3. Set Armor Level to 0.

Permissions:
Speak with Brokefoot for any changes, as it is his mod that I modified.

Credits:
Brokefoot.
Everyone credited in the original Mashup mod!
MrTroubleMaker for making the UNPB-BBP version.
author: psiroflcopter
